mapper.select: SELECT Detail.Id Detail_Id, Detail.BillId Detail_BillId, Detail.MaterId Detail_MaterId, Material.Name Material_MaterName, Detail.PriorAmount Detail_PriorAmount, Detail.PriorWeight Detail_PriorWeight, Detail.InAmount Detail_InAmount, Detail.InWeight Detail_InWeight, Detail.CurAmount Detail_CurAmount, Detail.CurWeight Detail_CurWeight FROM BalanceMainMaterDetail Detail LEFT JOIN Material ON Detail.MaterId = Material.Id WHERE Detail.BillId = #{billId}

SELECT Detail.Id Detail_Id, Detail.BillId Detail_BillId, Detail.MaterId Detail_MaterId, Material.Name Material_MaterName, Detail.PriorAmount Detail_PriorAmount, Detail.PriorWeight Detail_PriorWeight, Detail.InAmount Detail_InAmount, Detail.InWeight Detail_InWeight, Detail.CurAmount Detail_CurAmount, Detail.CurWeight Detail_CurWeight FROM BalanceMainMaterDetail Detail LEFT JOIN Material ON Detail.MaterId = Material.Id WHERE Detail.Id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into BalanceMainMaterDetail( BillId, MaterId, PriorAmount, PriorWeight, InAmount, InWeight, CurAmount, CurWeight ) values( #{billId}, #{materId}, #{amount}, #{priorAmount}, #{priorWeight}, #{curAmount}, #{curWeight} );

INSERT INTO BalanceMainMaterDetail( BillId, MaterId, PriorAmount, PriorWeight, InAmount, InWeight, CurAmount, CurWeight ) SELECT #{balanceBillId}, MaterId, BalanceAmount, BalanceWeight, InAmount, InWeight, (BalanceAmount + InAmount) - OutAmount, (BalanceWeight + InWeight) - OutWeight FROM materialInventory WHERE ClientId = #{clientId}
